content: DX 5-SM Powder-actuated tool Digitally enabled, fully automatic, high productivity, powder-actuated nailer for fastening metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Direct fastening tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features Smart tool that tells you when it needs cleaning or maintenance High productivity: Fully automatic piston return and cartridge transport Features power regulation for optimum fastener driving control Superb ergonomics and design with reduced recoil Applications Fastening metal roof decks to bar joists with a thickness of 1/8 to 3/8 with X-HSN metal sheet nail for roofing Fastening metal floor decks to bar joists and light gauge steel structures with a thickness of 1/8 to 3/8 with X-HSN metal sheet nail for flooring ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dimensions (LxWxH): 19.2 x 2.8 x 7.1 in Weight: 8.8 lb. Fastener Intake: 10 nails Technical Data | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 19.2 x 2.8 x 7.1 in | Weight | 8.8 lb | Fastener Intake | Collated | Fastener length range | 0.83 - 0.94 in | Cartridge type | .27 caliber short, 6.8/11 M10 | Automatic piston return | Yes | Bluetooth | Yes | Hilti Connect | Yes | Power (max.) | 325 J | Power regulation | Yes | Piston type | X-5-460-PSM ### ITEMS- 2142666 - Powder-actuated tool DX 5 SM - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DX 5_01 Basic unit - 1x MX SM Steel magazine assy - 1x 13 Round brush - 2x X-5-460-PSM Piston - 1x X-5-460-Clean Cleaning kit - 1x DX 460 / 462 / 5 / 6 Tool case
